titles.title: Water Resources Research Act Amendments of 2005
Water Resources Research Act Amendments of 2005
Water Resources Research Act Amendments of 2005
A bill to reauthorize grants for the water resources research and technology institutes established under the Water Resources Research Act of 1984.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Inhofe with amendments. With written report No. 109-90.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 139.

vote.text: Passed Senate with amendments by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 9/27/2005--Passed Senate amended. Water Resources Research Act Amendments of 2005 - Amends the Water Resources Research Act of 1984 to reauthorize appropriations for grants to states for water resources research and technology institutes and for research focused on water problems of a regional or interstate nature through FY2010.
